books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Sue Monk Kidd
books.description: The relationship between a wealthy Charleston girl, Sarah Grimké, who will grow up to become a prominent abolitionist, and the slave she is given for her 11th birthday.
books.name: THE INVENTION OF WINGS

books.author: by Anna Quindlen
books.description: An aging photographer rents a rural cottage and discovers sparks of creativity and desire.
books.name: STILL LIFE WITH BREAD CRUMBS

books.author: by Jeaniene Frost
books.description: A rogue C.I.A. agent’s secret activities threaten to raise tensions between humans and the undead, and the vampires Cat Crawfield and Bones must stop an all-out war; a Night Huntress novel.
books.name: UP FROM THE GRAVE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Joyce Maynard
books.description: One holiday weekend in New Hampshire, the lives of a single mother and her son are irrevocably changed when they show kindness to a stranger with a terrible secret. Originally published in 2009; now a movie.
books.name: LABOR DAY

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The first volume of the Clifton Chronicles introduces Harry Clifton, who searches for the truth about his father.
books.name: ONLY TIME WILL TELL

books.author: by Graeme Simsion
books.description: A man with Asperger's syndrome becomes involved with an unconventional woman.
books.name: THE ROSIE PROJECT

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Joanna Wylde
books.description: A biker takes over when his stepbrother turns out to be a deadbeat dad. A Reaper’s Motorcycle Club book.
books.name: REAPER'S LEGACY

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: Abby Miller, recently divorced and having returned to Seaview Key, falls for a handsome ex-soldier.
books.name: HOME TO SEAVIEW KEY

books.author: by James Patterson and Emily Raymond
books.description: Sixteen-year-old Axi Moore invites her best friend, whom she secretly loves, on a cross-country road trip.
books.name: FIRST LOVE

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: In Book 3 of the Clifton Chronicles, the focus shifts to a new generation — Sebastian, the son of Harry and Emma Clifton.
books.name: BEST KEPT SECRET

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: In the second volume of the Clifton Chronicles, it’s 1939 and Harry Clifton seizes a chance to bury his past.
books.name: THE SINS OF THE FATHER

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL
